data.question: What is the empirical formula of tp-PMBB-6?

What is the underlying net topology of tp-PMBB-6-stp-1?
Does tp-PMBB-5-acs-1 exhibit breathing phenomena?

What is the role of NH2 groups in tp-PMBB-6-stp-1's structure?
data.answer: They serve as 4-c and 6-c nodes, resulting in a square trigonal prismatic (stp) net.

data.question: Is the [Cu3(µ3-Cl)(RNH2)6Cl6] molecular building block used for the first time in a MOM in tp-PMBB-5-acs-1 and tp-PMBB-6-stp-1?
